headline: 5 Revealing Analyst Questions From Assurant’s Q4 Earnings Call
summary: Assurant’s fourth quarter results reflected continued expansion in its housing and lifestyle segments, but the market responded negatively to the results. Management highlighted the impact of ongoing investments in new product initiatives, such as the launch of home warranty offerings, and the resilience of its core housing business. CEO Keith Demmings credited double-digit growth in adjusted EBITDA, excluding catastrophe losses, to scale in mobile device protection and strong demand in lender-p

headline: 3 Reasons AIZ is Risky and 1 Stock to Buy Instead
summary: Assurant currently trades at $217.48 per share and has shown little upside over the past six months, posting a middling return of 4%.
